public class JointL21NormsMinimization
extends SupervisedFeatureSelection

Joint l_{2,1}-norms minimization. Optimization problem: min_W gamma \ || X' * W - Y ||_{2,1} + || W ||_{2,1}

Version:
1.0, Feb. 4th, 2012
Author:
Mingjie Qian
